description: Sequential record number within the import batch, preserving the original file order for processing and auditing.
Original name of the source file imported into the system, used for traceability and audit.
Flag indicating whether the import runs interactively step-by-step versus automatically; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the file layout/template (mapping version) used to parse the incoming fuel data.
Internal code or mapping identifier applied during import to drive rules or lookups; exact meaning unclear—confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the file’s format and delimiter settings used by the import process.
User or system account that created the import record.
Timestamp when the import record was created (system time zone).
User or process that last modified the import record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the import record.
Reference ID linking this import to a stored attachment or document (e.g., uploaded source file); confirm with SME.
Flag controlling whether this file should be executed/processed by the import job; confirm with SME.
